Total_Stalled_Opportunities.query: q = load "${App.Datasets.opportunity_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == "False"; q = group q by 'Id'; q = foreach q generate first('Name') as 'Name', sum('Amount') as 'sum_Amount', case when index_of("{{flatten(row(StageName_1.result, [], ["StageName", "Historical Average Hidden"])).asObject()}}",first('StageName')) > 0 && sum('Time_In_Current_Stage_Duration_Seconds') + 86400 > string_to_number(substr("{{flatten(row(StageName_1.result, [], ["StageName", "Historical Average Hidden"])).asObject()}},",index_of("{{flatten(row(StageName_1.result, [], ["StageName", "Historical Average Hidden"])).asObject()}}",first('StageName')) + len(first('StageName'))+1, index_of("{{flatten(row(StageName_1.result, [], ["StageName", "Historical Average Hidden"])).asObject()}},", ",", index_of("{{flatten(row(StageName_1.result, [], ["StageName", "Historical Average Hidden"])).asObject()}}",first('StageName')) + len(first('StageName')) +1 ) - (index_of("{{flatten(row(StageName_1.result, [], ["StageName", "Historical Average Hidden"])).asObject()}}",first('StageName')) + len(first('StageName')))-1)) then "True" else "False" end as 'Stalled'; q = filter q by 'Stalled' == "True"; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate count() as 'count_rows', avg('sum_Amount') as 'avg_Amount';

Stalled_Opportunities.query: q = load "${App.Datasets.opportunity_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == "False"; q = group q by 'Id'; q = foreach q generate first('Name') as 'Name', sum('Amount') as 'sum_Amount', case when index_of("{{flatten(row(StageName_1.result, [], ["StageName", "Historical Average Hidden"])).asObject()}}",first('StageName')) > 0 && sum('Time_In_Current_Stage_Duration_Seconds') + 86400 > string_to_number(substr("{{flatten(row(StageName_1.result, [], ["StageName", "Historical Average Hidden"])).asObject()}},",index_of("{{flatten(row(StageName_1.result, [], ["StageName", "Historical Average Hidden"])).asObject()}}",first('StageName')) + len(first('StageName'))+1, index_of("{{flatten(row(StageName_1.result, [], ["StageName", "Historical Average Hidden"])).asObject()}},", ",", index_of("{{flatten(row(StageName_1.result, [], ["StageName", "Historical Average Hidden"])).asObject()}}",first('StageName')) + len(first('StageName')) +1 ) - (index_of("{{flatten(row(StageName_1.result, [], ["StageName", "Historical Average Hidden"])).asObject()}}",first('StageName')) + len(first('StageName')))-1)) then "True" else "False" end as 'Stalled'; q = filter q by 'Stalled' == "True";q = group q by 'Name'; q = foreach q generate 'Name' as 'Name', sum('sum_Amount') as 'sum_Amount'; q = order q by 'sum_Amount' desc; q = limit q 2000;

StageName_1.query: a = load "${App.Datasets.opportunity_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; a = filter a by 'IsClosed' == "False"; b = load "${App.Datasets.pipeline_trending_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; b = filter b by 'Stage_IsClosed' == "False"; b = group b by ('OpportunityId', 'StageName'); b = foreach b generate 'OpportunityId' as 'OpportunityId', 'StageName' as 'StageName', sum('Duration') as 'sum_Duration', first('Stage_SortOrder') as 'Stage_SortOrder'; c = group a by 'StageName' full, b by 'StageName'; c = foreach c generate coalesce(a['StageName'],b['StageName']) as 'StageName', avg(a['Time_In_Current_Stage_Duration_Seconds'])/86400 as 'Open Opportunities', avg(b['sum_Duration'])/86400 as 'Historical Average', coalesce(ceil(avg(b['sum_Duration'])),0) as 'Historical Average Hidden', coalesce(first(a['Stage_SortOrder']),first(b['Stage_SortOrder'])) as 'Stage_SortOrder'; c = order c by 'Stage_SortOrder' asc;

content.displayTemplate: Which Opportunities got pushed the most?
Current stage is at least 1 day longer than the stage's historical average
Opportunities that have not been touched in 60 days
Click on a stage to view how opportunities moved on to different stages from the selected stage
Based on any Opportunity that advanced to the selected stage above
Maximize team efficiency by identifying bottlenecks in the sales process.
